about.description: I am a veterinarian, graduated from FMV-UTL, with over 10 years of experience in small companion animal clinics. I have a special interest in proximity care, focusing on welfare and quality of life, disease prevention, early diagnosis, and treatment. My mission is to provide home veterinary care, bringing comfort to animals and convenience to their owners.
